Posts.EditableText: I think the last time ilogged in was like October. Anways, my game which was almost half complete is no more! My computer thought it would be hilarious to get a virus which deleted everything! EVERYTHING! Damn viruses. So, im having to start from scratch which is a bit of a bitch. I dont know if an yone here will remember me, or even like me, but hey, im back.

Posts.EditableText:
Who said anything about it "beating" anyone?
It's a "game" and a limited (soon to be far more open) language.

Giving up is admitting the fact you are not best suited for the task - not always 'admitting defeat'.
